inputs.note:
Patient: Sarah Chen
DOB: 07/08/1954 | MRN: MRN-9901

ICU Admission Note

72F admitted from ED. Found hypoxic on room air (SpO2 85%), febrile to 39.2°C, tachycardic HR 112.

PMH: COPD, Type 2 Diabetes, Hypertension
Allergies: None known

ED Course: CXR shows right lower lobe consolidation. Blood cultures drawn x2. Lactate 4.5 mmol/L. BP dipped to 85/50 after 500cc NS bolus.

Assessment: Severe sepsis secondary to community-acquired pneumonia

Plan:
  - Piperacillin-Tazobactam (Zosyn) 4.5g IV q6h started
  - Maintenance IV fluids at 75 cc/hr
  - O2 via high-flow nasal cannula
  - Monitor BP and urine output hourly
  - Recheck lactate in 6 hours
inputs.labs:
Lactate: 4.5 mmol/L (H — CRITICAL)
WBC: 22.0 K/uL (H)
BP: 85/50 mmHg (post-bolus)
Procalcitonin: 8.2 ng/mL (H)
Creatinine: 1.8 mg/dL (H)
Glucose: 245 mg/dL (H)
SpO2: 85% on RA → 94% on HFNC
inputs.meds:
Piperacillin-Tazobactam 4.5g IV q6h
Maintenance NS at 75 cc/hr
Metformin 1000mg PO BID (home med — held)
Lisinopril 20mg PO Daily (home med — held)
